JAKKS Pacific, Inc. (NASDAQ: JAKK) is a leading designer, manufacturer and marketer of toys and consumer products sold throughout the world, with its headquarters in Santa Monica, California. JAKKS Pacific’s popular proprietary brands include BIG-FIGS™, XPV®, Max Tow™, Disguise®, Moose Mountain®, Funnoodle®, Maui®, Kids Only!®; a wide range of entertainment-inspired products featuring premier licensed properties; pet products; and, C’est Moi™, a skincare and performance make-up brand. Through JAKKS Cares, the company’s commitment to philanthropy, JAKKS is helping to make a positive impact on the lives of children. Visit us at [www.jakks.com](http://www.jakks.com/) and follow us on Instagram (@[jakkstoys](https://www.instagram.com/jakkstoys/)), Twitter (@[jakkstoys](https://twitter.com/JAKKStoys)) and Facebook ([JAKKS Pacific](https://www.facebook.com/jakkspacifictoys/)).

Sort by Start Date

Start Date

Order AscDesc

Desc

There are currently no events to display. 

JAKKS Pacific, Inc. (NASDAQ: JAKK) is a leading designer, manufacturer and marketer of toys and consumer products sold throughout the world, with its headquarters in Santa Monica, California. JAKKS Pacific’s popular proprietary brands include BIG-FIGS™, XPV®, Max Tow™, Disguise®, Moose Mountain®, Funnoodle®, Maui®, Kids Only!®; a wide range of entertainment-inspired products featuring premier licensed properties; pet products; and, C’est Moi™, a skincare and performance make-up brand. Through JAKKS Cares, the company’s commitment to philanthropy, JAKKS is helping to make a positive impact on the lives of children. Visit us at [www.jakks.com](http://www.jakks.com/) and follow us on Instagram (@[jakkstoys](https://www.instagram.com/jakkstoys/)), Twitter (@[jakkstoys](https://twitter.com/JAKKStoys)) and Facebook ([JAKKS Pacific](https://www.facebook.com/jakkspacifictoys/)).
